REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2404 reute d f BC-WYSE-<WYSE.O>-TO-GET 06-01 0051

TEXT.TITLE: WYSE <WYSE.O> TO GET LINK TECHNOLOGIES
TEXT.BODY: Wyse Technology said it agreed in principle to acquire privately-held Link Technologies Inc in exchange for an undisclosed amount of Wyse Technology shares. Link Technologies develops and markets computer terminals, Wyse also said. Reuter
